channel.title: 10 Questions With Kyle Brandt
channel.description: ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt’ is a hybrid trivia-and-interview show where athletes and celebrities compete to answer questions related to their lives and careers.

item.title: Sebastian Maniscalco
item.description: Sebastian Maniscalco competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The comedian discusses what it was like being on set with Robert De Niro for ‘The Irishman’ and ‘About My Father,’ his journey becoming a stand-up comedian, growing up in Chicago, and more.  Host: Kyle Brandt Guests: Sebastian Maniscalco Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Isaiah Blakely, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Jim Gaffigan
item.description: Jim Gaffigan competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The comedian shares what his college football career was like, explains the differences in performing around the United States and internationally, discusses the ideas from his latest Netflix special “Comedy Monster,” and much more.  Host: Kyle Brandt Guests: Jim Gaffigan Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Isaiah Blakely, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Jim Belushi
item.description: Jim Belushi competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ He shares fascinating stories about working with people like Arnold Schwarzenegger, Tupac Shakur, and John Candy; discusses his life as a Chicago sports fan; talks about why he enjoys making his TV show, ‘Growing Belushi’; and much more.  Host: Kyle Brandt Guests: Jim Belushi Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Isaiah Blakely, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Dan Patrick
item.description: Dan Patrick competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ He shares stories from his time at ESPN about pick-up basketball games between SportsCenter anchors, as well as the time he was pranked on SportsCenter live. He also discusses how he became a renowned sports talk show host after starting his career in music, how he’s found that success without needing to give hot takes, why he left ESPN, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guests: Dan Patrick Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Lani Renaldo, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Danny McBride
item.description: Danny McBride competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ He discusses the second season of HBO’s ‘The Righteous Gemstones,’ past roles in movies like 'Tropic Thunder,' the early days of his career leading up to his success, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guests: Danny McBride Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Isaiah Blakely, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Kurt Warner and Zachary Levi
item.description: Kurt Warner and Zachary Levi compete on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The duo discuss Levi’s role as Warner in ‘American Underdog: The Kurt Warner Story.’ Warner reminisces on moments from his Hall of Fame NFL career, Levi shares what it was like playing a Marvel character in ‘Shazam!,’ and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guests: Kurt Warner and Zachary Levi Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Isaiah Blakely, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Gayle King
item.description: Gayle King competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The CBS News host reflects on her interview with R. Kelly, shares stories from her long friendship with Oprah Winfrey, explains the stresses and enjoyments of working in live television, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Gayle King Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Isaiah Blakely, and Richie Bozek

item.title: J.K. Simmons
item.description: J.K. Simmons competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The Academy Award–winning actor discusses his upcoming films ‘National Champions’ and ‘Being the Ricardos,’ his famous roles in ‘Whiplash’ and ‘Spider-Man,’ receiving compliments from Arnold Schwarzenegger, his emotional Oscars speech, the best Detroit athletes, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: J.K. Simmons Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Steve Ahlman, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Charissa Thompson
item.description: Charissa Thompson competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ She tells her journey of becoming one of the most successful people in sports media, including why her jobs in the service industry made her a great interviewer. She also shares who the three people she would interview during a hypothetical Super Bowl halftime show would be, awkward interview stories, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Charissa Thompson Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Isaiah Blakely, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Bill Pullman
item.description: Bill Pullman competes on ’10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.' The actor explains why he thinks there isn’t a better movie hype speech than his speech in ‘Independence Day,’ memories from starring in ‘Spaceballs,' and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Bill Pullman Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Steve Ahlman, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Big Boi
item.description: Big Boi competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The multiplatinum, Grammy award–winning rapper revisits memories with OutKast, shares what to expect from his upcoming album ‘The Big Sleepover,’ discusses Atlanta sports fandom, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Big Boi Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Steve Ahlman, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Dennis Quaid
item.description: Dennis Quaid competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The actor shares what it was like to be on set for Al Pacino’s speech in ‘Any Given Sunday,’ debates whether he or Kevin Costner is the king of sports movies, reveals three famous Tom Hanks roles that he passed on, and more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Dennis Quaid Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Steve Ahlman, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Nate Burleson
item.description: Nate Burleson competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The former NFL wide receiver shares what he loves and doesn’t love about today’s NFL, his transition to becoming a media superstar at CBS, his thoughts about the infamous Minnesota Vikings boat party, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Nate Burleson Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Steve Alhman, Richie Bozek, and Isaiah Blakely

item.title: Mark Cuban
item.description: Mark Cuban competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The billionaire owner of the Dallas Mavericks and star of ‘Shark Tank’ discusses what business he regrets passing up the most, compares Mavs stars Luka Doncic and Dirk Nowitzki, reveals if he still as any interest in running for president, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Mark Cuban Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Steve Ahlman, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Eli Manning
item.description: Eli Manning competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The Super Bowl champion shares behind-the-scenes details about the 'Monday Night Football' Manning-cast with his brother Peyton, clears the air as to why he didn’t want to be drafted by the San Diego Chargers in 2004, tells how his ‘Dirty Dancing’ commercial with Odell Beckham Jr. came together, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Eli Manning Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal, Steve Ahlman, and Richie Bozek

item.title: Stephen A. Smith
item.description: Stephen A. Smith competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ Stephen A. discusses his journey through journalism to get to where he is today, his favorite media members, his thoughts on Aaron Rodgers’s possible departure from the Green Bay Packers, and more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Stephen A. Smith Producers: Steve Ahlman, Richie Bozek Additional Production Supervision: Noah Malale, Arjuna Ramgopal

item.title: Michael Strahan
item.description: Michael Strahan competes on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ Strahan reminisces on winning Super Bowl XLII and ending the New England Patriots' perfect season, shares why he pranked the internet about losing the gap in his teeth, and picks his favorite interviews in his media career. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Michael Strahan Producers: Steve Ahlman, Richie Bozek Additional Production Supervision: Noah Malale, Arjuna Ramgopal

item.title: Chris Godwin
item.description: Chris Godwin competes on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The Buccaneers wide receiver shares what it was like hearing Tom Brady’s Super Bowl pregame speech, what he thinks about the NFL’s new 17-game season, his upcoming wedding to his high school sweetheart (and navigating how to invite all his teammates), his Drake fandom, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Chris Godwin

item.title: Jeff Garlin
item.description: Jeff Garlin competes on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ Garlin shares updates on the upcoming season of ‘Curb Your Enthusiasm,’ discusses the brilliance of Eddie Murphy and Jim Carrey in his experiences working with them, the time he wrestled “Macho Man” Randy Savage, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Jeff Garlin

item.title: Josh Allen
item.description: Josh Allen competes on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ Allen shares his thoughts on a possible long-term contract extension with the Buffalo Bills, talks about wanting to take down the Kansas City Chiefs in the AFC, defends his intense Justin Bieber fandom, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Josh Allen

item.title: George Kittle
item.description: George Kittle competes on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The All-Pro tight end discusses why he thinks the NFC West is the best division in football, the upcoming NFL draft and potential 49ers moves, the story of getting a Joker tattoo the night before his wedding, and much, much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: George Kittle

item.title: Rob Gronkowski and Camille Kostek
item.description: Camille Kostek and Rob Gronkowski compete on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt' together. They discuss Kostek’s role as a host on 'Wipeout' and her 'SI' Swimsuit cover appearance. Gronkowski also discusses his future football plans and his time with the Patriots, and defends Tom Brady for throwing the Lombardi Trophy during the Super Bowl parade. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Rob Gronkowski and Camille Kostek

item.title: Pat McAfee
item.description: Pat McAfee competes on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.' McAfee discusses why he retired from the NFL after the best season of his career to pursue media, his pro wrestling career, and behind-the-scenes stories about moments like announcing the Indianapolis Colts’ 2019 NFL draft pick. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Pat McAfee

item.title: Brandon Marshall
item.description: Brandon Marshall competes on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The former star wide receiver shares untold stories from his 13-year NFL career, opens up about his borderline personality disorder diagnosis and the stigmas around mental health, discusses his new ‘I AM ATHLETE’ podcast and lifestyle and wellness work with House of Athlete, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Brandon Marshall

item.title: Sarah Chalke
item.description: Sarah Chalke competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ She discusses her latest role in ‘Firefly Lane,’ a Netflix original that recently achieved the no. 1 spot, how she and her fellow ‘Rick and Morty’ castmates are continuing to make the beloved animated series throughout quarantine, her past roles on hit comedies like ‘Scrubs,’ and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Sarah Chalke

item.title: Alex Smith
item.description: Alex Smith competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ Smith discusses his road from career-threatening injury to becoming the NFL Comeback Player of the Year, what it was like working with a rookie Patrick Mahomes, the story of the first time he met head coach Jim Harbaugh, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Alex Smith

item.title: Keegan-Michael Key
item.description: Keegan-Michael Key competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ Key breaks down how some of the most popular ‘Key & Peele’ sketches came together, discusses how he first became interested in becoming a writer, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Keegan-Michael Key

item.title: Brett Favre
item.description: Brett Favre competes on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.' Favre discusses how Aaron Rodgers is handling the Green Bay Packers' quarterback situation based on Favre's personal experience, the time Michael Strahan sacked him to break the single-season NFL sack record, the story behind his ‘Something About Mary’ cameo, and more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Brett Favre

item.title: Michael Irvin
item.description: Michael Irvin competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The NFL Hall of Famer and host of 'The Michael Irvin Podcast' shares stories from growing up in a family as one of 17 children, sneaking out of the locker room during the Super Bowl to watch Michael Jackson perform, and writing his own lines for his role in ‘The Longest Yard.’ Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Michael Irvin

item.title: Viggo Mortensen
item.description: Viggo Mortensen competes on ’10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The actor discusses his roles on ‘Lord of the Rings,’ ‘Green Book,’ and shares his favorite sports stories like seeing the ‘Miracle on Ice’ during the 1980 Winter Olympics in person.

item.title: Jemele Hill
item.description: Jemele Hill competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ She discusses the time Donald Trump tweeted about her, why cohosting ‘Sportscenter’ was her least favorite job at ESPN, beating Magic Johnson in spades, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Jemele Hill

item.title: Scott Stapp
item.description: Scott Stapp competes on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ Stapp shares some of his favorite Creed memories such as the first moment when he felt the band had “made it,” the legendary Thanksgiving Day halftime performance at a Cowboys game, other bands he’s had the opportunity to meet, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Scott Stapp

item.title: Matthew McConaughey
item.description: Matthew McConaughey competes on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.' McConaughey discusses how he broke into acting, his two-year break from acting, “The McConaissance,” his famous crying scene in 'Interstellar,' rehearsing for the tracking shot in 'True Detective,' and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Matthew McConaughey

item.title: Joel McHale
item.description: Joel McHale competes on ’10 Questions with Kyle Brandt.’ McHale discusses his experience speaking at the 2014 White House Correspondents' Dinner, his opportunity to interview the cast of ‘Tiger King’ for the nationwide special, working with Matt Damon and Mark Wahlberg, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Joel McHale

item.title: Adam Devine
item.description: Adam Devine competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ He shares what it was like working on a short film with Joe Biden, how he landed his role in ‘Pitch Perfect,’ overcoming a terrible accident that left him unable to walk for two years as a child, his new podcast with the cast of ‘Workaholics,’ and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Adam Devine

item.title: Patton Oswalt
item.description: Patton Oswalt competes on ’10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The actor and comedian discusses his various roles like his lead in ‘Ratatouille’; appearances on shows like ‘Seinfeld’ and ‘Parks and Recreation’; his new comedy special, ‘Arm’s Length’; and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Patton Oswalt

item.title: Tim Robbins
item.description: Tim Robbins competes on ’10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ He shares behind-the-scenes stories from 'The Shawshank Redemption' and discusses his experience winning an Academy Award, how he discovered the talent of Jack Black at a young age, his new project, 'Bobbo Supreme,' and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Tim Robbins

item.title: Bill Simmons
item.description: Bill Simmons competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ He discusses his interview with President Obama and why he doesn’t get nervous before talking to guests, how he stays current in pop culture, his feelings about Cam Newton and Tom Brady at this point in the 2020 season, and more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Bill Simmons

item.title: Steve Smith Sr.
item.description: Steve Smith Sr. competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ He discusses his relationship with former teammate and current New England Patriots quarterback Cam Newton (and whether or not he can win a Super Bowl with Bill Belichick), reflects on different areas of his 16-year career as an NFL wide receiver, and much more.  Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Steve Smith Sr.

item.title: Erin Andrews
item.description: Erin Andrews competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ She discusses what the NFL season will be like in empty stadiums after reporting at the Bucs-Saints season opener, how she would have handled her famous postgame interview with Richard Sherman differently, and many more stories. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Erin Andrews

item.title: Guy Fieri
item.description: Guy Fieri competes on ’10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ Fieri shares the origins of his identity on The Food Network, stories such as cooking at Sylvester Stallone’s house for Al Pacino, his thoughts on the Raiders' move to Las Vegas, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Guy Fieri

item.title: Kirk Cousins
item.description: Kirk Cousins competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ The Minnesota Vikings quarterback discusses his past contract negotiations, his journey from Michigan State to backing up Robert Griffin III, his attempt to book Creed for a private concert, and much more.

item.title: Paul Rudd
item.description: Paul Rudd competes on ’10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ Rudd discusses his role as Ant-Man in the ‘Avengers’ movies, working with comedic greats like Will Ferrell and Steve Carell, his Kansas City Chiefs fandom, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Paul Rudd

item.title: Tyrann Mathieu
item.description: Kansas City Chiefs safety Tyrann Mathieu competes on ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.’ They discuss Mathieu’s journey from being dismissed from LSU’s football team to becoming a Super Bowl champion, what makes his teammate Patrick Mahomes a superstar, his off-the-field efforts in the community where he grew up, and much more. Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Tyrann Mathieu

item.title: Aaron Rodgers
item.description: Aaron Rodgers competes as the first-ever contestant on '10 Questions With Kyle Brandt.' They discuss his future with the Packers, kneeling for the national anthem, how COVID-19 will affect the NFL season, and much more.  Host: Kyle Brandt Guest: Aaron Rodgers

item.title: Official Trailer
item.description: Official trailer featuring clips from upcoming episodes of ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt,’ which premieres Wednesday, August 12.

item.title: Introducing ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt’
item.description: Premiering Wednesday, August 12, ‘10 Questions With Kyle Brandt’ is a talk show with a twist: We ask your favorite athletes and celebrities to compete for the best score by trying to answer 10 questions that, whether they know it or not, somehow are related to their lives. Check out this exclusive clip from the pilot episode with Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers talking about his future in Green Bay.
